lenders.name: JENNIFER
lenders.loan_because:
I loan because I feel compelled to.  
What courage it takes to step out and say ...
"This is what I want to do ... can you lend me some $ so I can get started."  

I am self employed and in the early stages of my art career.  I have no right to be throwing any money around on extras, like nice dinners and fancy clothes.  

What I'd rather do ... What feeds my soul is using that $$ to help someone build their future.  

You know what I mean ... get their business started.   Like we are both doing it at the same time, just on different sides of the world.  

That sounds way more rewarding then a new pair of earrings.  

Heck! ... that can by 5 pigs in Cambodia!
lenders.occupational_info:
I am an artist.  Always have ... always will be.  My "real" name had to have been Crayola in a past life. 

I started my company BuTT UgLee back in 2001.   

What the heck is a BuTT UgLee?
Glad you asked ... 
I'll break this down plain and simple.  
I have characters that run around in my head.  
They all look lost, confused, worried, clueless, giddy, drunk, out of breath, in need of Psychiatric drugs or ... a big, big hug.  

I create each character using muslin, stuffed with polyfill, painted with acrylics and dimensional paint.  If I'm lucky I get to add funky wire, glitter, colored floss and/or an assortment of trim to create dimensional, whimsical and very unconventional wall art. 

An UgLee is truly a piece of art.
UgLees are not plush and not considered a toy.  At first glance they do look like a stuffed animal.  Soft and fluffy ...  Not so!

Once the muslin is painted with acrylics the texture starts to change.  It feels a bit firmer.  Once all the layers of paint and the final sealer are added the muslin (that was once flimsey) feels more like canvas.  This enables the UgLee to hang from the wall or lean on a shelf.

I like to call BuTT UgLee's unconventional, dimensional wall art.  They are whimsical, wild, wacky, unique, hand crafted, original and one-of-a-kind designs.   

 I am simply amazed when I look at all of the places I have shipped my babies.
I have a horse named Denzel in Victoria, Australia.
I spider in Gremany.
A chick and a spider in Singapore.
Two primitive dolls in Middlesex, United Kingdom.
Two angels Honolulu, Hawaii.
My site and Blog have views from 74 different countries!  Are you kidding me?
AND ... Tons of super, loyal collectors in just about every state.
I am humbled.

lenders.name: Ellen
lenders.loan_because: It is important to help people to start and develop productive and profitable businesses so that they can be financially independent.
lenders.occupational_info:
Ellen R. Singer, a well-established management consultant, brings her expertise in clinical psychology and finance to BizBuilding, Inc., the ultimate resource for business professionals. Singer has extensive experience managing companies and starting new businesses. Her expertise in finance gives added value to the services she provides.

BizBuilding, Inc. is a New York-based management consulting practice that provides mid-sized companies with the expertise to compete more effectively. The company assists its clients by identifying the points between their business objectives, financial resources and quantifiable tactics that make the most effective use of available resources.

Specialties:
Management Consulting
Business and Marketing Plans
Connection to Financing Resources
Negotiations Leader
Corporate Crisis Intervention
Business Development and Referral Sourcing
Workshops
Business Coaching and Counseling

We are glad to help give opportunities to hard working entrepreneurs.

lenders.name: James
lenders.loan_because: I am lucky enough to be able to give, and am glad to find a way to ensure a charitable contribution goes straight to the hands of the people who really need it.

lenders.name: Mathew
lenders.occupational_info: I work for doctors (radiologists), if they can make a difference in people's lives, why can't I?

lenders.name: Pamela & Jon
lenders.loan_because: We can! We aren't billionaires but we have enough to share - we want to help create work that supports their families and communities.
lenders.occupational_info: Jon works with a computer networking company to keep toxic substances out of their products.  Pamela is an internet entrepreneur trying to change the world.

lenders.name: Chester
lenders.loan_because: I know microlending is one of the best ways to level the global market playing field.
lenders.occupational_info: I fix computer systems.

lenders.name: Barbara
lenders.loan_because: I like the idea of enabling hard working people around the world to improve their situations

lenders.name: Heather
lenders.loan_because: I want to make a difference in someone's life.
lenders.occupational_info: I walk with people on their spiritual Spiritual journey.

lenders.name: Lynn
lenders.loan_because: This is my Christmas gift to my daughter.

lenders.name: emile
lenders.loan_because: It is a dignified way of helping another person.

lenders.name: Dave
lenders.loan_because: I believe that people will work hard to improve their lives if they have an opportunity.

lenders.name: Patrick
lenders.loan_because: I believe that you can change the world one person at a time.
lenders.occupational_info: I make a living as a writer talking about movies and entertainment.

lenders.name: Megha
lenders.loan_because: I think this is a great idea that allows people to borrow and lend money for the purpose of personal/family growth and success.

lenders.name: Alex
lenders.loan_because: I like helping people.

lenders.name: Lisa
lenders.loan_because: I'm able to
lenders.occupational_info: i teach 7 and 8 year olds

lenders.name: Vanessa
lenders.loan_because: I think this is a great program and I have been blessed in my life.  I think we all need to give back and help those that need it.
lenders.occupational_info: I like to help people help themselves.

lenders.name: Anna
lenders.loan_because: I have more than enough.

lenders.name: Matt
lenders.loan_because: micro finance rocks!

lenders.name: Jolanda
lenders.occupational_info: I work for a publisher of Christian education and worship resources. My role is to coordinate training for Sunday school coordinators and teachers.

lenders.name: Omar
lenders.loan_because: I can.
lenders.occupational_info: I bring the best out of people towards a goal and ensure they are recognized & respected for their contributions.

lenders.name: Admiral
lenders.occupational_info: I explore strange new worlds, seek out new lifeforms and new civilizations, all while boldly going where no one has gone before.

lenders.name: Roseita
lenders.loan_because: it makes dreams come true around the world :)

lenders.name: Bryan
lenders.loan_because: I want to make money off the interest.  Yes, I know it's a 0% rate.  I'm going to make it up in volume.

lenders.name: Jocelyn
lenders.loan_because: I want to support people around the world.  I think it is amazing to help someone that you never met. I loan because I want to make a difference in a life, if only for a moment.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a university student.  I go to school full time.  I work at night.  I am studing to become an Elementary school teacher.

lenders.name: Kait
lenders.occupational_info: I am currently in college studying Psychology.

lenders.name: gladys
lenders.loan_because: i would like to loan because i want to start a business that will make my life better and i can able send me children to go to school.,
lenders.occupational_info: very poor

lenders.name: Ari
lenders.loan_because: I like the idea of helping to provide others with the opportunity to succeed.

lenders.name: Gordon
lenders.loan_because: I love capitalism and think that the best way to make a difference in the world is to allow people the opportunity to help themselves.
lenders.occupational_info: I install steel, copper, and zinc roofing systems.

lenders.name: Emory MicroCredit Club
lenders.occupational_info: We are a group of students, alumni and faculty committed to alleviating poverty through microcredit.  We believe in Kiva's mission and want to do everything we can to help.

lenders.name: Annelise
lenders.loan_because: Micro-credit is quite possibly the most amazing thing I have ever heard of.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm an intern for the International Youth Internship Program funded by CIDA in Guayaquil/Quito, Ecuador.
